page.title: 09SOCIAL SURVEY
page.content: We went to the precinct in Cotgrave to interview people.70% of the people did not work in Cotgrave and 50% of those people used the bus,to go to work.15% walked to work 10% used a bike and 10% had a car.The remainder went to work a different way each day. We asked them what amenities they used in Cotgrave.The health centre,shops and post office were the most popular with the library and the bank close behind. Most people thought there were not enough amenities in Cotgrave and would like to have a swimming pool,a comprehensive school and a cinema: The nearest swimming pool is Radcliffe-on-Trent about five miles away and so all the children have to be bussed to school.
